Comment: What shall it be; Vienna, Bishop, Center Pawn, Center Game, Danish, King's Gambit, Petroff, Roy Lopez, Italian, or perhaps even the Fried Liver
Things are shaping up now. Ruy, Italian, or the Fried Liver would be fun!!
Oh, a switch-a-roonie by black, and out comes the Petroff. Very cool, I really enjoy the petroff!!

White takes a road somewhat less traveled here, the Petroff-Italian Variation. Now that we have our opening well established, let's see if White stays the course or risks uncharted waters. Should be fun!!
I'm going to stay the course and play as accurate as I can, afterall my opponent has both tempo and out-rates quit a bit.
At this point the percentages favor black, but let's see if I have what it takes, it's early days still.
Nxe5 perhaps a little more accurate, Bb3 is still good. Lots of play remaining
Black continues to stay the course. These waters are still fairly well charted.
